glsa.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Adobe Flash Player could result in the execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted SWF file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Adobe Flash Player users should upgrade to the latest version:
